title: Circus Clown Gragas
body:
This skin should be part of the next Surprise Party bundle.
Gragas carries a water balloon as his cask.
When it breaks and the water balloon splashes, randomly either 1) a white rabbit hops out of it, 2) a spring goes boing, or 3) pigeons fly away.
He has a white painted face and honks his red nose.
He has big, red shoes and striped pants.
Big poof-ball buttons run up his shirt.
This makes for a great chroma.
Gragas needs a new skin!!!
